title: Chromebook Restoration and Exploration - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
tags: Chromebook Restoration and Exploration - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
description: A Samsung Chromebook falls into the chubby lap of Krazy Ken. Coincidentally, Krazy Ken discovers someone in need of a computer, so he takes on a quest to restore this Chromebook, fiddle with Google's Chrome OS, and send it on its way!  Want more videos like this?   Subscribe for more tech videos!    Like the CC on Facebook   Follow the CC on Twitter   Follow Ken on Twitter: @Hildron101010  Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures #65 - Chromebook Restoration and Exploration  Contact the CC    Want music for your videos?   (We use these guys a lot. They're good.)  Get film gear Ken uses   On a lower budget?   Amazon links are powered by the Amazon Associates Program.  #KrazyKen
